title: PBE Servers
body: Hi guys, I was wondering why can't people on the OCE servers go on the PBE servers. {{champion:238}}

replies.body: You can, though only some regions accounts are supported directly on the PBE, this is because of technical limitations more than anything. Just create an NA account and apply and you have as good a chance of getting a PBE account as anyone.
Long story short, It isn't necessary for Riot to host a dedicated PBE server in Oceania because they receive enough feedback and support from the NA and EUW servers.

There are no PBE servers located in EU, the only PBE server is physically located in NA (the PBE is not tied to any region) because that is where all the dev happens. It isn't about "we get enough feedback from here".
Right, well I wasn't aware of that sorry.

No worries, just wanted to make sure you had the right idea here. Riot Central (who control PBE/dev) and Riot NA are in the same offices for now, but they are separate...I suppose departments works here. It's like how the skins team and the balance teams are different. They interact certainly, but are a separate body.
